MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Kelly Creek Project in North America dated September 2004

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Kelly Creek Project in North America dated September 2004
document.description: This report reviews exploration results within the area now covered by mineral claims Kelly 1 to Kelly 4 and K.C.1 to K.C.4, discusses exploration potential, and makes recommendations for further exploration.
